response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your operations. Given its unique features and benefits, I estimate its value to be well above $800,000. Considering the exceptional quality and potential impact on your business, I am offering this exclusive opportunity to acquire the product at a special introductory price of $750,000. This offer is valid for a limited time only, so please let me know if you would like to proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 750000}
